code:
// creates a date object that contains day, month, year and stamp in ISO format
export default function setDate(){var date=new Date();var day=date.getDate();var month=date.getMonth()+1;var year=date.getFullYear();var stamp="".concat(year,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(day);return{year:year,month:month,day:day,stamp:stamp};}
